original_title: Exams Dept starts calling for 2023 A/L exam applications till July 28
original_body_lines: The Examinations Department announced that they have started calling for applications online for the 2023 GCE Advanced Level (A/L) Examinations, Commissioner General of Examinations Amith Jayasundara said.
He said calling for applications started yesterday, and applications will be accepted till July 28.

Accordingly, the applicants can direct their application only through the online system, and the Commissioner General requested the applicants to log on to the department's official website at www.doenets.lk, www.onlineexams.gov.lk/eic, or through the mobile app DoE. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
